en.contents:
We announced a brief site close on June 30 to Sentizens with a hint of Sentre Version 3.0 on the way. So exactly what kind of upgrade will be in this version?

Explore Sentre V3 here: https://hub.sentre.io/

New Feature Corner

To help Sentizens easily find our updates, we added a New Feature card.



Simply go to SenAsset and check the bottom left corner. You'll see the magic âœ¨


Token Sweeper

Now you can reclaim your renting fee in SOL for unused/closed account(s)!



All accounts with 0 token is applicable for renting fee reclaim. Simply head to the Token Sweeper, choose those accounts and press ðŸ§¹Sweep!


Asset Category

To help you better identify and manage assets, we added a category:



Now you can easily separate tokens from NFTs, and move your assets across chains through the Wormhole Portal Bridge!


Context Menu

Pinning your DApp is easier than ever! Simply right-click on your chosen DApp and a context menu will show up:



Mint Selection

To strengthen user protection and prevent scamming, we now provide verification for legitimate tokens:


A small blue tick icon will be shown next to all verified tokens, as shown in the image.


Your token selection history will also be stored. Instead of scrolling up and down to find that one token you always use, now you can simply choose from your top 8, right below the search box!


OS Update

Last but not least, the OS update!


This is actually the biggest update of Sentre V3. The OS is now packed, which helps developers build their DApps on SenHub with more independence and ease!


Follow us for updates and news:

Website | Twitter | Discord | Telegram | Blog
en.title: Introducing Sentre V3 - Your optimized toolbox for Solana devs
